listing_company_name: Queensland Sotheby's International Realty - MAIN BEACH
description:
Steeped in nature is one of the last remaining land parcels within the sought after – Award Winning Currumbin Ecovillage. Just under an acre and positioned in a prime and private position awaits your opportunity to build your dream home.

This premium lot presents within the surrounds of an established green canopy, walking trails with a natural watering hole, and a Site Proposed Scheme with architectural engineered plans and all associated reports, incorporating a building envelope with a North-East aspect on 3682sqm.

A quaint fully decked out pod structure, complete with air conditioning, power and kitchen facilities is also positioned on-site, ideal for supervising the build of your new home.

The Eco Village's growing establishment now offers over 20 community facilities, including a large hall complete with events sized kitchen - available for use by residents, large outdoor pizza oven, Bali huts, ball court, gym, playgrounds, oval, large lap pool with kids play area, BMX track and games room, shared workspace with wi-fi, workshops, community herb garden, Pasture & Co cafe, homewares and gift stores, Ground at Currumbin Bathhouse and organic green grocer, village markets, alternative therapies and more.

On any given day you can be met by some of the 65-resident kangaroos and numerous other Australian wildlife, including 412 native bird species, fruit doves, kookaburras, wallabies of various varieties, echidnas, Jacanas, Australasian Darter, Whistlers, Eastern Whipbird, Topknot Pigeon, Egrets and Chestnut-breasted Mannikin, Fairy Martin, Buff-banded Rail and more. No domestic pets are permitted within the Eco Village to ensure the co-habitation of the wildlife within the 270-acres of internationally recognised biodiversity. This is truly a nature lovers paradise and only 7-15 minutes from famous Gold Coast beaches, schools, shopping centres, and international airport.

To find out more on the Currumbin Eco village go to: www.theecovillage.com.au

PROPERTY FEATURES:

• Nestled on a 3682sqm block in the award-winning Currumbin Ecovillage
• Architectural engineered house plans and associated reports included
• Only 7-15 minutes' drive to Queenland's most famous surf beaches
• A short drive to schools, shopping centers, restaurants, services clubs, sports grounds
• A short stroll to local amenities such as Pasture & Co cafe, Ground organic & wholefoods outlet and the world class Ecovillage Community facilities
• Wildlife Conservation Area - No dogs or cats permitted
• 15 minutes from Gold Coast International Airport

To take advantage of this rare opportunity please contact
Scott Keatley 0408 387 330 or Morgan Keatley 0450 737 985 for more information.
